item.description:
Please RSVP!

The IBD CANSLIM meetings will continue to be at MIT!!!! NOT in Waltham. They will start at 7pm, not 6pm.


This will be the third in the IBD Meetup curriculum series. This lesson: How to Read Charts with Skill & Identify Correct Buy Points . Kier McDonough will again be presenting. For those of you who don't know, Kier runs Brigos Capital Management on CANSLIM principles and has taught Level I and Level II courses for Investors Business Daily.


If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, please come. Moving the meeting back to MIT, using the IBD provided curriculum and having Kier present, it is a definite upgrade.

» Here’s a link to the PDF file for the third lesson: »
http://www.investors....

Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD CANSLIM Meeting- How to Read Charts with Skill & Identify Correct Buy Points
